content: I just tried to test the Whova to Zoom connection for the first meeting in the Questionnaire track, and when I click "Join the stream", Zoom opened and wanted me to "sign in". Are people supposed to sign in to Zoom, as well as Whova?
Typically it will just carry over your Whova info, unless you're logged into Zoom otherwise. Let us know if the issue continues.
Everyone seemed to get in without a problem, so I won't worry about it.
Good deal. Let us know if you encounter any other friction.
